name: Westerosi
description: You hail from the Seven Kingdoms.

name: Braavosi
description:
You hail from Braavos, the city of freedom where slavery is shunned.

Braavos is the greatest and most powerful of the Free Cities, located in a lagoon on the north-western end of Essos, where the narrow sea and the Shivering Sea meet.

name: Dothraki
description: The Dothraki are the horse riders from the great Dothraki Sea, they value strength and freedom above all.

name: Valyrian
description: The Valyrian are the occupants of the Free Cities, with the exception of Braavos.

name: Qartheen
description: The Qartheen are the occupants of Qarth, "the greatest city that ever was or ever will be" according to their conviction.

name: Wildling
description: You come from the cold hard north above the wall, the great wilderness that spans from the Frostfangs Mountain range in the west to the Bay of Seals in the east.
